duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and nurture relationships with clients, understanding their yacht desires, preferences, and needs. Guide them through the yacht buying or selling process with professionalism and expertise.
Stay at the forefront of the yacht industry, keeping a pulse on market trends, pricing dynamics, and new yacht listings. Utilize this knowledge to assist clients in making informed decisions.
Manage and market yacht listings, ensuring they receive maximum exposure through various channels, including online listings, social media, and industry events.
Skillfully negotiate yacht sales, striving to secure the best possible outcomes for clients while maintaining the highest ethical standards.
Handle administrative tasks related to yacht transactions, including contracts, paperwork, and financial transactions, with meticulous attention to detail.
Educate clients about the intricacies of yacht ownership, maintenance, and operation, fostering long-term relationships built on trust and expertise.
